flavorTextOverrides.crewPod: It looks like this pod is configured for a different user. I should use my VR pod instead. It's the open pod with the green light on top.
flavorTextOverrides.crewComplement: Beds for a bridge crew of four... When the Owl's ready to fly, I should recruit a team for the mission.
flavorTextOverrides.chestNothing: Does this chest open? Guess not... Well, it was worth a shot.
flavorTextOverrides.replacementParts: Replacement parts for a neural Cloud interface. Never hurts to be prepared.
flavorTextOverrides.standupSet: "What did the zero say to the eight? Nice belt!" ... Sadly, that's the best one in this standup routine. I hope whoever wrote this iterates a few more times before going on stage.
flavorTextOverrides.fuel: Wonder what kind of fuel this thing runs on...
flavorTextOverrides.navigationSystemOffline: The navigation system lets the ship travel to different parts of The Cloud. Looks like it's still offline...
flavorTextOverrides.battleTactics: Notes on battle tactics when facing the forces of the Legacy Systems. Someone expects trouble once we get the ship online...
flavorTextOverrides.airlock: An airlock, I think. If this is a virtual environment, will I still get sucked out into space if I open it? Not sure I want to find out.
